autosave.hint: Saves the game automatically on a regular basis. Does not overwrite manual saves even if enabled.

clearBattleDataOnExit.hint: Reduces save data size by clearing stale battle data after a battle is completed.

maxSkillsInCategory.hint: Number of skills the player is able to hold in each category at once. Numbers smaller than 4 are not recommended.

trainDepartureGracePeriod.hint: Minutes after planned departure time until the train departs automatically, if the player is not on board.

trainFuelValue.hint: A single unit of train fuel will last this many minutes. High values lower the difficulty. Extremely low values may be unwinnable.

turnDelayMs.hint: Milliseconds to delay when performing an enemy battle turn.
